title: I wanna be the.............................................................GUY!
author: shing10287
txt_content:
本帖最后由 shing10287 于 2011-10-15 12:11 编辑 

我想做一個男人!
In the year 200x on his 15th birthday... a child left home on his dangerous and epic quest to become The Guy! Many years ago, "The Guy" left world and retreat to "Dungeon of Doom". Now "Young Boy" goes to defeat "The Guy" and become "The Guy" with his gun pass handed down by former "Grandfather the Guy". Go find the "8 units". Now become "The Guy".（在200X年他的15歲生日...一個孩子離家出走，去完成充滿危險和史詩般的成為那個男人的任務！很多年前，「那個男人」離開這個世界並回到「末日地牢」。現在，「小男孩」要用前「那個爺爺」傳給他的槍去戰勝「那個男人」並成為「那個男人」。去找到「8個單位」。現在成為「那個男人」。）
